edu.washington.ext

Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an edu.washington.ext.Invoice. The invoice is a collection of InvoiceItems, and the edu.washington.ext.Invoice object performs invoice functions on the group of items. Author: Alex Version: 3/16/14.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Invoice()
      Constructs a new edu.washington.ext.Invoice

      Gets the discount amount being applied to the invoice.

      Gets total dollar amount of discounts on invoice.

      Gets invoice amount due, after discounts.

      Gets total invoice amount, before any discounts.

      Checks the invoice for problems and prints it out.

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Checks for null parameter.
        edu.washington.ext.DiscountException - Checks that a discounted item is not being added to a discounted invoice.
